origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'OptionMarket.get_trading_hours_report', 'description': 'Get the latest trading hours report for the option market', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'query for the latest report'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the latest trading hours report'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一家公司的风险管理分析师，希望通过期权对冲原材料价格风险。首先，我需要获取最新的期权市场交易时间分析报告。你能帮我获取这份报告吗？另外，我还需要获取主要原材料期权的交易时间数据，并分析这些时间对交易的影响。最后，基于分析结果，推荐适合的交易时间。当前这一步的目标是什么？
获取最新的期权市场交易时间分析报告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么？
OptionMarket.get_trading_hours_report
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么？
latest_report

{'report': 'The latest trading hours report for the option market indicates that the market is open from 9:30 AM to 4:00 PM EST, with extended hours from 4:00 PM to 8:00 PM EST for certain products.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The latest trading hours report for the option market indicates that the market is open from 9:30 AM to 4:00 PM EST, with extended hours from 4:00 PM to 8:00 PM EST for certain products.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么？

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'report': 'The trading hours for raw materials options are from 8:00 AM to 2:00 PM EST, with no extended hours.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么？
分析这些时间对交易的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么？
OptionMarket.analyze_trading_hours

raw_materials_options

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'analysis': 'The trading hours for raw materials options are shorter than the general option market, which may limit the ability to react to market changes during extended hours. However, this also reduces exposure to high volatility during non-standard trading times.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么？
推荐适合的交易时间

raw_materials_options
